body: Hi Kristoffer, Your file seems to have run pretty fast on my machine.  I have the E+ simulation finishing in 38.3 seconds: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zCFAyXbrZcu2GCan7eIrTfX*oFX0I4YBuyRay1aNpFuEIn*2OJ-aoPLZ*1aaC9P0ho5gN6g5YZWa5fgncYv1zWUNrW*yjK4E/CubeRunOK.PNG) What type of CPU is in your machine (# of cores and GHz)? Also, I can recommend the "Color Surfaces by EP Result" component for coloring your cube's surfaces in a way that also produces a legend. -Chris
